description: Separate ToolReviewArticle and GuideArticle types with distinct schemas and rendering components. Guides will use prose sections, bettor-resources will keep review cards.
constraints: bettor-resources articles must NOT change (data or rendering)
guides data files will be updated separately by user
existing IndustryReport type kept as alias for backwards compatibility

userStories.title: Create ToolReviewArticle schema with strict review fields
acceptanceCriteria: ToolReviewArticleSchema in schemas.ts with required: reviewContext, groups with items having url/rating/pros/cons/bestFor/quickVerdict
BonusGroupItemSchema split into ReviewItemSchema (strict) and GuideItemSchema (flexible)
Type exported in index.ts
npm run lint passes
npm run build passes

userStories.title: Create GuideArticle schema with flexible section fields
acceptanceCriteria: GuideArticleSchema in schemas.ts with: sections array (title + items), items have id/title/content, optional keyStats/badge
No url/rating/pros/cons/bestFor/quickVerdict in guide items
Type exported in index.ts
IndustryReport kept as union type for backwards compatibility
npm run lint passes
npm run build passes

userStories.title: Create GuideSections rendering component
acceptanceCriteria: New component src/components/article/GuideSections.tsx
Renders sections with title as h2, items as prose cards
No collapsible, no 'Read full review' button, no Visit Site button
Shows: title, keyStats (if any), badge (as label not ribbon), markdown content
Exported from article/index.ts
npm run lint passes
npm run build passes

userStories.title: Update guides page to use GuideSections
acceptanceCriteria: src/app/[region]/guides/[slug]/page.tsx uses GuideSections instead of ArticleGroups
No logo processing needed (guides don't have product logos)
Guides render as prose sections without review UI
npm run lint passes
npm run build passes

acceptanceCriteria: Remove field descriptions that are now enforced by Zod schema

postFeatureReview.summary: Separated article types into ToolReviewArticle (strict, for bettor-resources) and GuideArticle (flexible, for guides). Created GuideSections component for prose rendering. Updated guides page to use new component.
postFeatureReview.impact: Types: schemas.ts, index.ts. Components: GuideSections.tsx, index.ts. Pages: guides/[slug]/page.tsx. Docs: CONTENT_GUIDE.md. Bettor-resources articles unchanged.
postFeatureReview.issues: Guides data files still use old IndustryReport structure - user will update separately. GuideArticle type is available but not enforced on existing data yet.
postFeatureReview.recommendations: 1) Update guides data files to match GuideArticle schema. 2) Consider runtime validation with GuideArticleSchema.parse() when loading guides. 3) Add visual tests for GuideSections component.
